org.ensembl.driver
Interface TranslationAdaptor

All Superinterfaces:
Adaptor, java.rmi.Remote
public interface TranslationAdaptor
extends Adaptor

Provides access to Translations in the datasource.

Field Summary
static java.lang.String TYPE
          Name of the default TranslationAdaptor available from a driver.

TYPE

public static final java.lang.String TYPE
Name of the default TranslationAdaptor available from a driver.

Constant Field Values
Method Detail

fetch

public Translation fetch(long internalID)
                  throws AdaptorException
Fetches a translation with the specified id.

Parameters:
internalID - internalID of a translation in the datagabase.
Returns:
A translation matching the internalID, or null if non found.
Throws:
AdaptorException

fetch

public Translation fetch(long internalID,
                         boolean loadChildren)
                  throws AdaptorException
Fetches a translation with the specified id with or without start and end exons preloaded.

Parameters:
internalID - internalID of a translation in the datagabase.
loadChildren - whether to preload the child exons.
Returns:
A translation matching the internalID, or null if non found.
Throws:
AdaptorException

fetchByTranscript

public Translation fetchByTranscript(long transcriptInternalID)
                              throws AdaptorException
Fetch a translation by the internal ID of its associated translation.

Parameters:
transcriptInternalID - The internal ID of the transcript this translation belongs to.
Returns:
The translation associated with the transcript, or null if there is none (e.g. pseudogene).
Throws:
AdaptorException

fetchByTranscript

public Translation fetchByTranscript(long transcriptInternalID,
                                     boolean loadChildren)
                              throws AdaptorException
Fetch a translation by the internal ID of its associated translation with or without including start and end exons.

Parameters:
transcriptInternalID - The internal ID of the transcript this translation belongs to.
loadChildren - whether to preload the child exons.
Returns:
The translation associated with the transcript, or null if there is none (e.g. pseudogene).
Throws:
AdaptorException

fetchByTranscripts

public java.util.List fetchByTranscripts(long[] transcriptInternalIDs,
                                         boolean loadChildren)
                                  throws AdaptorException
Fetch a translations by the internal IDs of their associated translation.

Parameters:
transcriptInternalIDs - array of transcript internal IDs.
Returns:
The translations associated with the transcripts, or null if there is none (e.g. pseudogene.) return order is not specified.
Throws:
AdaptorException

fetch

public Translation fetch(java.lang.String accessionID)
                  throws AdaptorException
Returns:
A translation matching the accessionID, or null if non found.
Throws:
AdaptorException

fetchBySynonym

public java.util.List fetchBySynonym(java.lang.String synonym)
                              throws AdaptorException
Returns:
Translations matching the synonym, empty list if non found.
Throws:
AdaptorException

                                 throws AdaptorException
Returns:
Translations matching the interpro id, empty list if non found.

AdaptorException

fetchAccessionID

public void fetchAccessionID(Translation translation)
                      throws AdaptorException
Retrieves translation's accession from persistent store and sets translation.accession.

Throws:
AdaptorException

fetchVersion

public void fetchVersion(Translation translation)
                  throws AdaptorException
Retrieves translation's version from persistent store and sets translation.version. Version is set to 0 if it is unavailable in persistent store.

Parameters:
translation - translation.internalID should be >0
Throws:
AdaptorException

fetchKnown

public void fetchKnown(Translation translation)
                throws AdaptorException
Retrieves from persistent store whether translation is known and sets translation.known.

Throws:
AdaptorException

fetchKnown

public void fetchKnown(Translation[] translations)
                throws AdaptorException
Retrieves from persistent store whether translations are known and for each one sets translation.known.

Throws:
AdaptorException

completeInterproIDs

public void completeInterproIDs(Translation translation)
                         throws AdaptorException
Retrieves the interproIDs for the translation and sets them on the translation. Sets the interproIDs to be an empty array if non are found.

Parameters:
translation - translation that interproIDs should be retrieved for.
Throws:
AdaptorException

fetchAll

public java.util.List fetchAll()
                        throws AdaptorException
Fetch all the translations from the database.

Throws:
AdaptorException
